subject: Automobile Racing
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The suspended driver A. J. Allmendinger said that he would participate in Nascar’s substance-abuse recovery program, a sign that he wants to return to racing as soon as possible and avoid a fight over the accuracy of his failed drug test.
snippet: The suspended driver A. J. Allmendinger said that he would participate in Nascar’s substance-abuse recovery program, a sign that he wants to return to racing as soon as possible and avoid a fight over the accuracy of his failed drug test.
